section.title: Continous Builds
section.p: At buildbot.xhochy.com we have a continous builder which goes through each new Subversion revision, at the moment we do not provide a environment for testing on it, so all builds will fail. In the future, we hope to be able to provide a Package for each revision. This should be a kind of modern nightly builds.
